name: Arbor
description:
All the winding pathways of your life have led you here. To the forest. How you got here doesn't matter - what's important is what waits for you within. The forest holds the answer; to what question is for you to decide.

Arbor is an interactive horror novella in which you explore an ancient, uncanny forest. Randomisation and player choice combine to create a unique journey each time, with a number of possible outcomes. Seek the heart of the forest, and discover secrets sleeping deep in the earth.

Arbor was developed in Twine. The game will run in full screen in a browser. Compatible with all known browsers and mobile-ready.
